message.content:
cs.DC, cs.DB, cs.DS, cs.OS, cs.CR 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) - The paper deals with data replication in distributed systems, which falls under the scope of this sub-category. 
2. cs.DB (Databases) - The paper proposes a data replication protocol, which is a core concept in database systems. 
3. cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) - The Circular quorum systems proposed in the paper are a novel data structure that can be studied under this sub-category. 
4. cs.OS (Operating Systems) - The paper deals with distributed systems, which are often implemented as part of an operating system. 
5. cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) - The paper may touch upon security concerns related to data replication in distributed systems.
